name: Magic Duel: DoReCo Edition
overview: Magic Duel: DoReCo Edition is a 2014 sequel to Jörn Ruchmann's 2013 game Magic Duel. The goal is the same. The game is 2 player only and you play rival wizards trying to take each other down. As in all other "duel" games of the same nature, the one with the most points is the winner after a set amount of points is reached.
